zh.title: 西班牙新宪法生效，确立民主制度
约翰·列侬遇刺身亡，震惊世界
联合国教科文组织通过世界遗产名录
印度教极端分子拆毁阿约提亚清真寺
统一石油公司与美孚公司合并
“勇气号”火星探测器成功发射
中国与东盟签署贸易货物协议
迪拜世界债务危机爆发
中国探月工程嫦娥三号成功发射
意大利修宪公投失败，总理伦齐辞职

en.title: John Lennon's final recording session took place.
President Reagan signed Executive Order 12333, expanding intelligence activities.
The Montreal Canadiens retired the jersey of Yvan Cournoyer.
Pan Am ceased operations after 64 years.
Unity Module, the first U.S.-built component of the ISS, was launched.
The last flight of Concorde landed at Filton, UK.
Hurricane Vince made landfall in Spain, an unusual event.
George H.W. Bush's state funeral was held in Washington, D.C.
